# This Rmd loads previously imported,  tidied data from the PSI MC and generates estimates of hourly and diel cumulative photon dose to cultures.

# Set Options

## Set figure caption font size

```{css, echo=FALSE}
p.caption {
  font-size: 18px;
}
```

## Set Chunk Options

```{r setup, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, message = FALSE)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(fig.path='Figs/')
```

```{r libraries}
library(tidyverse)
library(zoo)
```

## Read Data
```{r read data}
MCFiles <- list.files(path = file.path("..", "Data", "ImportedData", "ImportedMCData"), full.names = TRUE)
MCFiles

MCData <- readRDS(file = MCFiles[1]) |>
  mutate(deltaOD = OD680 - OD720)

  colnames(MCData)
```

```{r par_time_plot}
MCData |>
  ggplot() +
  geom_point(aes(x = time, y = Actinic_par, colour = WL)) +
  facet_grid(cols = vars(Tube)) +
  theme_bw()

MCData |>
  filter(time >= 48,
         time <= 72) |>
  ggplot() +
  geom_point(aes(x = time, y = Actinic_par, colour = WL)) +
  facet_grid(cols = vars(Tube)) +
  theme_bw()

MCData |>
  filter(time >= 48,
         time <= 72) |>
  ggplot() +
  geom_point(aes(x = time, y = deltaOD, colour = WL)) +
  facet_grid(cols = vars(Tube)) +
  theme_bw()
```

```{r hourly photon estimates}
#temporary
#use case_when to remove 'dark' periods?
#bad to filter and only then estimate growth rates; better to do across 1 h window
MCData24h <-  MCData |>
  filter(time >= 48,
         time <= 72) |>
  mutate(Actinic_photonsm2h = zoo::rollsum(Actinic_par * 5, k = 12, fill = NA, align = "right")) |>
  filter(time - round(time) == 0)

MCData24h |>
  ggplot() +
  geom_point(aes(x = time, y = Actinic_photonsm2h, colour = WL)) +
  facet_grid(cols = vars(Tube)) +
  theme_bw()


```

```{r hourly mu deltaOD estimates}
#works for 1 h spacing of data points
MCData24h |>
  ggplot() +
  geom_point(aes(x = time, y = mu_deltaODh, colour = WL)) +
  facet_grid(cols = vars(Tube)) +
  theme_bw()


MCData24h <- MCData24h |>
  mutate(mu_deltaODh = (log(deltaOD) - log(lag(deltaOD)))/1)

MCData24h |>
  ggplot() +
  geom_point(aes(x = time, y = mu_deltaODh, colour = WL)) +
  facet_grid(cols = vars(Tube)) +
  theme_bw()

MCData24h |>
  ggplot() +
  geom_point(aes(x = Actinic_photonsm2h, y = mu_deltaODh, colour = WL)) +
  facet_grid(cols = vars(Tube)) +
  theme_bw()
```
